alert.note: Alert for Darke; Miami; Montgomery; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:56PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN PREBLE, SOUTHEASTERN DARKE, MONTGOMERY AND SOUTHWESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 655 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Lewisburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Huber Heights, Trotwood, Miamisburg, Vandalia, Englewood, Moraine, West Milton, West Carrollton, Lewisburg, West Alexandria, Riverside, Clayton, Union, Brookville, Germantown, New Lebanon, Farmersville, Shiloh and Phillipsburg. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 9 and 36. I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 48 and 64. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
